snippet: Monitors designed to gauge physical activity and subsequent calories burned might become a silver bullet for weight loss and for sticking to New Year’s resolutions.
abstract: Four simplified electronic monitors are reviewed which are designed to accurately gauge physical activity and the calories burned.
lead_paragraph: Monitors designed to gauge physical activity and subsequent calories burned might become a silver bullet for weight loss and for sticking to New Year’s resolutions.
